author: James Oliphant
title: Governors' races in 'blue wall' states carry high stakes for voting rights

sentence: It's impossible to predict whether Karamo will defeat the incumbent Democrat Jocelyn Benson, but Michigan is usually closely divided, and Democratic Governor Gretchen Whitmer, atop the ticket, holds only a small polling lead over the GOP challenger, James Craig.
author: David A. Graham
title: The Wackadoodle Wave
